column2: BRIEF-ONE Gas Reports Q1 Earnings Per Share Of $1.72 April 30 (Reuters) - ONE Gas Inc: * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $1.47 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * CAPITAL EXPENDITURES ARE EXPECTED TO BE $375 MILLION IN 2018 * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $3.11 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY TOTAL REVENUE $638.5 MILLION VERSUS $550.4 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
